TunableList.name: UI_FILTER_TYPES
TunableList.description: A list of filter categories containing filter types used to filter the sim's inventory in the UI. The inventory can also be sorted by filter type; filters lower on this list will sort lower when sorted by filter type.

TunableTuple.description: A category of filters in the UI. Contains a name and a list of filters.

Tunable.name: category_name
Tunable.description: The name displayed in the UI for this filter category.

TunableList.name: filters
TunableList.description: The filters used in this category.

TunableTuple.description: Data that defines a filter type in the inventory UI.

Tunable.name: debug_name
Tunable.description: A unique name used to select this inventory filter type through the console command ui.inventory.set_sort_filter when the inventory ui is open.

TunableEnum.description: If an object has any of these tags, it will fail this filter even if it would otherwise pass.

Tunable.name: filter_name
Tunable.description: The name displayed in the UI for this filter type.

TunableList.name: required_packs
TunableList.description: If any packs are tuned here, at least one of them must be present for this filter to appear in the UI.

TunableEnum.description: Tags that should be considered part of this filter.

TunableList.name: UI_SORT_TYPES
TunableList.description: A list of gameplay-based sort types used in the sim's inventory in the UI.

TunableTuple.description: Data that defines this sort for the inventory UI.

Tunable.name: debug_name
Tunable.description: A unique name used to select this inventory sort type through the console command ui.inventory.set_sort_filter when the inventory ui is open.

Tunable.name: is_ascending
Tunable.description: Whether a higher value from object_data will sort first. If a high value means that the object should sort lower (E.G. brokenness), this should be false.

TunableVariant.name: object_data
TunableVariant.description: The object data that determines the sort order of this sort type.

TunableList.name: states
TunableList.description: States whose values are used to sort on for this sort type.

Tunable.name: sort_name
Tunable.description: The name displayed in the UI for this sort type.
